channel.title: üè¢ University of Wisconsin-Madison on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Wisconsin-Madison on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A New Neural Kernel Regime: The Inductive Bias of Multi-Task Learning
item.description: Multi-task learning with shallow ReLU networks yields almost always unique solutions equivalent to kernel methods, unlike single-task settings.

item.title: Accelerating Augmentation Invariance Pretraining
item.description: Boost Vision Transformer pretraining speed by 4x with novel sequence compression techniques!

item.title: Active Learning of General Halfspaces: Label Queries vs Membership Queries
item.description: Active learning for general halfspaces is surprisingly hard; membership queries are key to efficiency.

item.title: AHA: Human-Assisted Out-of-Distribution Generalization and Detection
item.description: AHA: Human-assisted OOD learning maximizes OOD generalization and detection by strategically labeling data in a novel maximum disambiguation region, significantly outperforming existing methods with o…

item.title: An effective framework for estimating individualized treatment rules
item.description: This paper introduces a unified ITR estimation framework using covariate balancing weights, achieving significant gains in robustness and effectiveness compared to existing methods.

item.title: BackdoorAlign: Mitigating Fine-tuning based Jailbreak Attack with Backdoor Enhanced Safety Alignment
item.description: BackdoorAlign defends against fine-tuning-based LLM jailbreaks using a ‘backdoor trigger’ to enforce safety alignment during inference, effectively mitigating risks with minimal additional safety exam…

item.title: Coherence-free Entrywise Estimation of Eigenvectors in Low-rank Signal-plus-noise Matrix Models
item.description: New method for eigenvector estimation achieves optimal rates without coherence dependence, improving low-rank matrix denoising and related tasks.

item.title: Consistency Purification: Effective and Efficient Diffusion Purification towards Certified Robustness
item.description: Consistency Purification boosts certified robustness by efficiently purifying noisy images using a one-step generative model, achieving state-of-the-art results while maintaining semantic alignment.

item.title: Deterministic Policies for Constrained Reinforcement Learning in Polynomial Time
item.description: This paper presents an efficient algorithm to compute near-optimal deterministic policies for constrained reinforcement learning problems, solving a 25-year-old computational complexity challenge.

item.title: Faster Algorithms for User-Level Private Stochastic Convex Optimization
item.description: Faster algorithms achieve optimal excess risk in user-level private stochastic convex optimization, overcoming limitations of prior methods without restrictive assumptions.

item.title: Grammar-Aligned Decoding
item.description: Adaptive Sampling with Approximate Expected Futures (ASAp) ensures LLMs generate grammatically correct outputs that closely match the model’s original probability distribution.

item.title: HaloScope: Harnessing Unlabeled LLM Generations for Hallucination Detection
item.description: HaloScope leverages unlabeled LLM outputs to accurately detect AI hallucinations without human annotation, significantly outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Learning a Single Neuron Robustly to Distributional Shifts and Adversarial Label Noise
item.description: This work presents a computationally efficient algorithm that robustly learns a single neuron despite adversarial label noise and distributional shifts, providing provable approximation guarantees.

item.title: Optimal Design for Human Preference Elicitation
item.description: Dope: Efficient algorithms optimize human preference elicitation for learning to rank, minimizing ranking loss and prediction error with absolute and ranking feedback models.

item.title: Pearls from Pebbles: Improved Confidence Functions for Auto-labeling
item.description: Colander: a novel auto-labeling technique boosts data efficiency by 60%, optimizing confidence functions for maximum coverage with minimal error.

item.title: Reliable Learning of Halfspaces under Gaussian Marginals
item.description: New algorithm reliably learns Gaussian halfspaces with significantly improved sample and computational complexity compared to existing methods, offering strong computational separation from standard a…

item.title: RL in Latent MDPs is Tractable: Online Guarantees via Off-Policy Evaluation
item.description: First sample-efficient algorithm for LMDPs without separation assumptions, achieving near-optimal guarantees via novel off-policy evaluation.

item.title: Span-Based Optimal Sample Complexity for Weakly Communicating and General Average Reward MDPs
item.description: This paper achieves minimax-optimal bounds for learning near-optimal policies in average-reward MDPs, addressing a long-standing open problem in reinforcement learning.

item.title: Task-Agnostic Machine-Learning-Assisted Inference
item.description: PSPS: a novel task-agnostic framework enables valid and efficient ML-assisted statistical inference for virtually any task, simply using summary statistics from existing analysis routines!

item.title: The ALCHEmist: Automated Labeling 500x CHEaper than LLM Data Annotators
item.description: Alchemist, a novel automated labeling system, reduces data annotation costs by 500x compared to LLMs while improving accuracy by an average of 12.9%.

item.title: Tighter Convergence Bounds for Shuffled SGD via Primal-Dual Perspective
item.description: Shuffled SGD’s convergence is now better understood through a primal-dual analysis, yielding tighter bounds that align with its superior empirical performance.

item.title: Towards Calibrated Robust Fine-Tuning of Vision-Language Models
item.description: Calibrated robust fine-tuning boosts vision-language model accuracy and confidence in out-of-distribution scenarios by using a constrained multimodal contrastive loss and self-distillation.

item.title: TSDS: Data Selection for Task-Specific Model Finetuning
item.description: TSDS: A novel framework selects optimal training data for efficient large language model finetuning using only a few examples, boosting performance.

item.title: Yo'LLaVA: Your Personalized Language and Vision Assistant
item.description: Yo’LLaVA personalizes Large Multimodal Models (LMMs) to converse about specific subjects using just a few images, embedding concepts into latent tokens for efficient and effective personalized convers…
